summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MGNREGA data visualization app for Uttar Pradesh. Backend APIs are fully functional after fixing MongoDB ObjectId serialization issue. Frontend navigation, data display, and core features working correctly. Charts have rendering issues but data integration is working.

resolved_bugs.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error causing 500 responses
resolved_bugs.fix_applied: Fixed data caching to exclude _id field properly

ui_bugs.issue: Recharts showing width/height -1 errors, charts not rendering properly
ui_bugs.symptoms: Console errors: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0'

passed_tests: All 8 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with correct bilingual content (Hindi + English)
State overview displays 75 districts with accurate statistics
District search and region filtering functionality
District dashboard displays all 8 key metrics correctly
District comparison feature (select multiple districts, compare data)
Back navigation buttons throughout the app
Location detection button present (geolocation API integration)
Bilingual content display throughout the app
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix chart rendering issue in District Dashboard - Recharts containers need proper CSS dimensions. The charts are receiving width/height of -1 which prevents proper rendering. All data is loading correctly, only the visual chart display needs CSS fixes.
